contents.text: Thank you for calling Mira, the East Bay fertility tracker that helps you get pregnant faster through personalized hormone analysis.
For questions about using your Mira device and test kits, press 1.
For help setting up your Mira fertility tracker device, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Mira support specialist for device setup assistance.

navigationGoals: I need help setting up my new Mira fertility tracker device.
Help me set up my new Mira fertility tracker device.
I need help pairing my Mira device with the app via Bluetooth LE and calibrating its hormone sensor.
I need help setting up my fertility tracker.
I’m trying to set up my Mira tracker and can’t get it to sync with the app.

contents.text: For questions about ordering test cartridges or replacing hardware, press 2.
One moment please, we are connecting you to our product team for ordering and replacement inquiries.

navigationGoals: I want to reorder test cartridges for my Mira device.
Order replacement test cartridges for my Mira tracker.
I want to reorder my estrogen and LH test cartridges and replace my analyzer module.
I need to order replacement test cartridges and hardware parts.
I need to reorder my hormone test cartridges.

contents.text: For assistance with interpreting your hormone results and ovulation planning, press 2.
For help understanding your hormone readings, press 1.
Thank you for holding. A fertility coach will be with you shortly to explain your hormone results.

navigationGoals: I’d like clarification on my recent hormone test results.
Explain what my latest hormone readings mean.
I need a detailed walkthrough of my estradiol and LH concentration graphs to pinpoint my ovulation window.
I need help understanding my hormone test results.
I’d like assistance analyzing my estrogen and LH readings.

contents.text: For personalized ovulation planning consultations, press 2.
Please stay on the line while we transfer you to an ovulation planning specialist.

navigationGoals: I need a personalized ovulation timing plan.
Connect me with someone for personalized ovulation planning.
I’d like a personalized ovulation scheduling session using my hormone trend analytics.
I need to talk to a specialist about planning my ovulation.
Could I get a personalized ovulation timing consultation based on my data?
